entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
